snippet: The policy will allow immigrants in the United States illegally who are close relatives of active military troops and veterans to stay and move toward becoming permanent residents.
abstract: Obama administration issues new policy that will allow immigrants in United States illegally who are close relatives of active military troops and veterans to stay and move toward becoming permanent residents; shift comes as legislation to grant legal status to millions of illegal immigrants has stalled in Congress.
lead_paragraph: The policy will allow immigrants in the United States illegally who are close relatives of active military troops and veterans to stay and move toward becoming permanent residents.

headline.main: Immigrants Closely Tied to Military Get Reprieve
headline.print_headline: Immigrants Closely Tied To Military Get Reprieve

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
